content: In the US you pay with dollars, but in Japan, China and South Korea, you pay with what?

In Japan, the currency is the Japanese Yen. In China, it's the Chinese Yuan or Renminbi. In South Korea, they use the South Korean Won. So, when you're in these countries, you would pay with their respective currencies: Yen in Japan, Yuan/Renminbi in China, and Won in South Korea.
